price: Muri bo hari abasezeranyije Allah (bagira bati) “Naramuka aduhaye mu ngabire ze, rwose tuzatanga amaturo ndetse tunabe mu bakora ibikorwa byiza.”
arabic: ۞ وَمِنۡهُم مَّنۡ عَٰهَدَ ٱللَّهَ لَئِنۡ ءَاتَىٰنَا مِن فَضۡلِهِۦ لَنَصَّدَّقَنَّ وَلَنَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wamin'hum man ʿāhada al-laha la-in ātānā min faḍlihi lanaṣṣaddaqanna walanakūnanna mina al-ṣāliḥīna
